1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import os
3 import rospy
4 import rospkg
5 import tf
6 from gazebo_msgs.srv import SpawnModel, SpawnModelRequest, \
7  SetModelState, SetLinkState
8 from gazebo_msgs.msg import ModelState, LinkState, Quaternion, Point, Pose
9 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
10 
11 
12 class IMUBoxStateManager():
13  def __init__(self, model_names, init_poses=None, sdf=True):
14  """
15  IMUBoxStateManager class.
16 
17  Arguments
18  ---------
19  `init_poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
20  [Pose(Position xyz, Orientation quaternion)]
21  `sdf: `bool`
22  launch from sdf or urdf
23  """
24  self.model_names = model_names
25  self.n = len(model_names)
26  self.sdf = sdf
27  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
28  self.imu_q = Quaternion()
29  self.position = Point(1, -1, 1)
30  init_poses = [Pose(position=self.position, orientation=self.imu_q)]
31  # rospy.Subscriber('imu0_pose', Quaternion, self.imu_callback)
32  rospy.Subscriber('imu/data_raw', Imu, self.imu_callback)
33 
34  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_model_state')
35  if sdf:
36  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model')
37  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy(
38  '/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model', SpawnModel)
39  model_path = os.path.join(
40  ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imubox/model.sdf')
41  self.set_model_state = rospy.ServiceProxy(
42  '/gazebo/set_model_state', SetModelState)
43  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
44  xml_string = f.read().replace('\n', '')
45  else:
46  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model')
47  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy(
48  '/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model', SpawnModel)
49  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imu.urdf')
50  self.set_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy(
51  '/gazebo/set_link_state', SetLinkState)
52  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
53  xml_string = f.read()
54 
55  if init_poses is None:
56  q = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(0, 0, 0)
57  orientation = Quaternion(q[0], q[1], q[2], q[3])
58  position = Point(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
59  init_pose = Pose(position=position, orientation=orientation)
60  init_poses = [init_pose for i in range(self.n)]
61 
62  self.init_poses = init_poses
63  self.req = SpawnModelRequest()
64  self.req.model_xml = xml_string
65 
66  def imu_callback(self, data):
67  """
68  IMU callback.
69 
70  Arguments
71  ---------
72  `data`: `sensor_msgs.msg.Imu`
73  The `Imu` message, sed to get orientation.
74 
75  """
76  # self.imu_q = data
77  self.imu_q = data.orientation
78 
79  def spawn(self):
80  """
81  Spawns the model
82  """
83  for model_name, pose in zip(self.model_names, self.init_poses):
84  try:
85  self.req.model_name = model_name
86  self.req.initial_pose = pose
87  res = self.spawn_model(self.req)
88  print(res)
89  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
90  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
91 
92  def set_poses(self, names, poses):
93  """
94  Sets the poses of the IMU.
95 
96  Arguments
97  ---------
98  `names`: `List[str]`
99  The names of the IMUs
100 
101  `poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
102  The poses of the IMUs
103  """
104  for name, pose in zip(names, poses):
105  self.set_pose(name, pose)
106 
107  def set_pose(self, name, pose=None):
108  """
109  Sets a pose of an IMU
110 
111  Arguments
112  ---------
113  `name`: `str`
114  The name of the IMU
115 
116  `poses`: `geometry_msgs.msg.Pose`
117  The pose of the IMU
118  """
119  pose = Pose(position=self.position, orientation=self.imu_q)
120 
121  if self.sdf:
122  try:
123  state_msg = ModelState()
124  state_msg.model_name = name
125  state_msg.pose = pose
126  state_msg.reference_frame = "world"
127  res = self.set_model_state(state_msg)
128  print(res)
129  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
130  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
131  else:
132  try:
133  link_msg = LinkState()
134  link_msg.link_name = name
135  link_msg.pose = pose
136  link_msg.reference_frame = "world"
137  res = self.set_link_state(state_msg)
138  print(res)
139  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
140  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
141 
142 
143 if __name__ == '__main__':
144  rospy.init_node("set_estimated_imu_positions")
145 
146  model_names = ['imu5']
147  state_manager = IMUBoxStateManager(model_names)
148  state_manager.spawn()
149 
150  r = rospy.Rate(30)
151 
152  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
153  state_manager.set_pose(model_names[0])
154  r.sleep()
